actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 874, 81st Congress, with respect to the counting of certain Indian children.

summary.text: Provides that, with regard to computing financial assistance to local educational agencies, real property which qualifies as Federal property shall not lose such qualification because it is used for a low-rent housing project for Indians.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 874, 81st Congress, with respect to the counting of certain Indian children.
